thread.title: Apple adds Windows PC support for iCloud Photos to its iCloud Drive & Outlook package

title: Apple adds Windows PC support for iCloud Photos to its iCloud Drive & Outlook package
text:
Apple adds Windows PC support for iCloud Photos to its iCloud Drive & Outlook package 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
Apple has released free update to "iCloud for Windows" adding support for iOS-synced Photos to the company's software for accessing iCloud D...
